title: Sydney's Ultimate Sleepover at Taronga Zoo
description: Treat the family to an incredible experience at Taronga Zoo, located just a 12-minute ferry ride from the Sydney CBD. Spend one night camping in luxury Safari tents with all meals included, get to meet some of the Zoo's most friendly animals, venture on a night safari, enjoy free entry to the zoo the next day and two exclusive behind-the-scenes tours.
offer_address: Bradleys Head Road, Mosman, New South Wales 2088, Australia

title: Luxury Taronga Zoo Eco-Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Koala Encounter & Exclusive Zoo Tours
description:
Discover a hidden gem on Sydney’s iconic harbour - find yourself wrapped up in architecturally designed tranquillity all while koalas climb trees, echidnas roam and platypus play around you at this elegant eco-retreat. The Wildlife Retreat at Taronga is located in the heart of Sydney's Taronga Zoo and is designed to blend seamlessly into the lush bushland while boasting unmatched views of Sydney Harbour’s iconic skyline.

With exclusive access to the retreat’s wildlife sanctuary, you’ll have the rare opportunity to be introduced to amazing native wildlife, some of which you may have never encountered before. At this stunning retreat, savour sophisticated rooms with high-end amenities, all encapsulated by the surrounding zooscape. For dining, indulge at the award-winning Me-Gal Restaurant, serving a seasonally modified native Australian menu, and savour quiet moments in the 360-degree open-concept N'Gurra Lounge overlooking the sparkling Sydney Harbour.
offer_address: Bradleys Head Road, Mosman, New South Wales 2088, Australia
